longBusinessSummary.0: Sunteck Realty Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate construction and development business in India. The company designs, develops, and manages residential, commercial, retail, and mixed-use properties under the Signature, Signia, Sunteck, Sunteck City, Sunteck World, and Sunteck brands. It also leases properties; and provides incidental services. The company sells its properties through sales offices, channel partners, wealth managers, institutions, and property exhibitions to corporate customers, high-net-worth individuals, and retail customers. Sunteck Realty Limited was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Mumbai, India.
